AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: I am a Full Stack Developer dedicated to making applications run smoothly. I am passionate about the industry due to the endless oppoutunites for personal growth.
As a great team player, I am eager to contribute to new projects and take on new challenges.
Some of the technologies I have trained and worked with include (but are not limited to):
FeatureProjects.Title: Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Highlighted Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Homes
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Angular based, Web application project for property purchases.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: To - Do App
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Monitoring application in order to track and alter tasks that are assigned to employees, made with Angular.

Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: I will be glad to hear from you if you want to discuss new opportunities. Write to me, and I will respond as soon as I see your message.
